free_text.Learning outcomes: Become familiar with different types of data generated by functional genomics (sequence data, gene models, evolutionary trees, expression and regulation data).[br/]Learn common algorithms for sequence analysis (sequence alignement, Hidden Markov Models), and methods to discover or infer patterns of gene regulation from quantitative data.[br/]Aquire a quantitative understanding of transcriptional mechanisms.
free_text.Content: Genome sequencing and assembly, genome annotation and gene prediction, Hidden Markov Models, comparative genomics, phylogenetic trees, models of molecular evolution, transcription, gene expression profiling, gene regulation
